# Basic data transformation 
 
## shift_operator  {-}

Description: `shift` operator performs a shift by a constant value. 

Link: https://github.com/tercen/shift_operator 
 
## asinh_operator  {-}

Description: `asinh` operator performs an inverse hyperbolic sine of values. 

Link: https://github.com/tercen/asinh_operator 
 
## signchange_operator  {-}

Description: `signchange` operator negates the data value, i.e. sign changes 

Link: https://github.com/tercen/signchange_operator
